Broken Sword.description: I believe someone tried to use it on a Rasaka…
Broken Sword.name: Broken Sword

Casual Gloves.description: A pair of gloves you can find at any equipment shops
Casual Gloves.name: Casual Gloves

Dagger.description: What? You want a fancier name?
Dagger.name: Dagger

Handwritten Bible.description: Someone has written this during their free time.
Handwritten Bible.name: Handwritten Bible

Hunter's Bow.description: We have a bow, we have a hunter. Uh! Hunter's bow!
Hunter's Bow.name: Hunter's Bow

Leather tunic.description: A tunic made of low quality leather
Leather tunic.name: Leather tunic

Seashell Necklace.description: A necklace that hurts your neck.
Seashell Necklace.name: Seashell Necklace

Stick.description: Hmm… as long as it works.
Stick.name: Stick

Wanderer Shoes.description: A pair of shoes for those who like to move it move it
Wanderer Shoes.name: Wanderer Shoes

Wooden Shield.description: I don't think this is reliable. You should get a better one as soon as possible.
Wooden Shield.name: Wooden Shield

Lottery ticket.description: Used to join lottery. You can buy up to 5 tickets.
Lottery ticket.name: Lottery ticket

Status Recovery.description: One ability of the System. It's restore your HP, MP. It's also remove all bad effects if you have any.
Status Recovery.name: Status Recovery

life potion.description:
a bottle filled with blood. Yes blood!
Use `heal` to restore your HP
life potion.name: life potion

mana potion.description:
a bottle filled with water. Just water!
Use `drink` to restore your MP
mana potion.name: mana potion

thunder stone.description:
A stone from The Lightning Monarch's garden
Used to reset stats point
thunder stone.name: thunder stone

Arrow rain.description: Summon rain of arrows that deal damage to enemies from far away.
Arrow rain.name: Arrow rain

Barrier.description: Protects your allies with a powerful magic barrier. The barrier effects is depends on how "tank" the Tanker is.
Barrier.name: Barrier

Bloodlust.description: The enemy felt your immense desire to kill, making them in a state of fear - cannot use skills for 1 - 2 turns if they have less $t(glossary:stats:str) than you.
Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust

Bone Crunch.description: Razan bite the enemy. If the enemy HP is below 50%, they will be stunned for 1 - 2 turn.
Bone Crunch.name: Bone Crunch

Buff.description: If use on "$t(glossary:effects.Bless)" target, it will increase the next damage of them. Otherwise, it will decrease the next damage of them.
Buff.name: Buff

Camouflage.description: A spell to hide the Healer's presence. Become invisible for 2 - 4 turns
Camouflage.name: Camouflage

Chomp.description: Raikan chomp on the enemy. There's a chance to slow the target down for 4 - 5 turns. $t(common:healer)'s $t(glossary:skills.Heal.name) can remove this effect.
Chomp.name: Chomp

Dagger Throw.description: Throw a sharp dagger towards the enemy's throat.
Dagger Throw.name: Dagger Throw

Evade.description: Enhance visual and trying to dodge enemy's attack. Dodge chance depends on your $t(glossary:stats.agi) and $t(glossary:stats.def)/$t(glossary:stats.mr).
Evade.name: Evade

Evolve.description: Normal mob can evolve to a boss. They will evolve if they survive for 4 turns (alive turns + killed players (1 turn/kill)).
Evolve.name: Evolve

Flame Spear.description: Create spears of fire and launch them at enemies.
Flame Spear.name: Flame Spear

Heal.description: If the $t(glossary:skills.Judge.name)'s result is "$t(glossary:effects.Bless)" this skill will heal the target otherwise will deal damage to them.
Heal.name: Heal

Immobile curse.description: Curse the targeted creature(s) and reduce their $t(glossary:stats.agi)
Immobile curse.name: Immobile curse

Judge.description: As a priest, you can ask for a judge from God to the target. The result will affect your skills.
Judge.name: Judge

Leap.description: Goblin leap on the furthest enemy.
Leap.name: Leap

Lunge.description: A powerful slash that aims for the enemy's head. Deal physical damage according to your $t(glossary:stats.str)
Lunge.name: Lunge

Magic Arrow.description: Summon a powerful arrow to shoot at the enemy. Deal magical damage according to your $t(glossary:stats.int).
Magic Arrow.name: Magic Arrow

Multishoot.description: Shoot multiple arrows at the enemy on the same spot. Decreases their defense by 30% for 1 - 3 turns.
Multishoot.name: Multishoot

Poison Fang.description: Rasaka launch their fangs to poison the target enemies for 2 - 3 turns. Targeted enemies suffering magic damage every turn.
Poison Fang.name: Poison Fang

Power Smash.description: Launch a heavy smash that breaks the enemy's bones.
Power Smash.name: Power Smash

Punch.description: Throw a heavy punch to the enemy face.
Punch.name: Punch

Scratch.description: Briga scratch the enemy. Inflict them with $t(glossary:effects.Grievous Wounds) for 1 - 2 turns.
Scratch.name: Scratch

Seismic Shove.description: Stone Golem knock the enemy forwards for 1 - 2 blocks.
Seismic Shove.name: Seismic Shove

Sprint.description: Apply the armor penetration effect for the next attack.
Sprint.name: Sprint

Taunt.description: Provoke the enemy to get their attention, they'll now target you for 3 turns
Taunt.name: Taunt

Thunderbolt.description: Another elemental skills use thunder to damage the enemy. Has a small chance to stun
Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt

Vitals.description: Find the vitals of enemies. Your next attack will deal more damage with the amount of 20% target's max $t(glossary:stats.hp).
Vitals.name: Vitals

Water ball.description: Compress blocks of water and throw them at the enemies.
Water ball.name: Water ball

AGILITY.description:
Increase move range.

**Note**: 5/35/80/140/215 $t(glossary:stats.agi) give you 1/2/3/4/5 move range.
AGILITY.name: $t(glossary:stats.agi)

Hunter Slayer.description: The more hunters you kill, the less EXP you can earn.
Hunter Slayer.name: Hunter Slayer

INTELLIGENCE.description:
Increase magic damage output and your MP.

**Rate**: 2 INT = 1 MP.
INTELLIGENCE.name: $t(glossary:stats.int)

SLOW.description: Reduces the move range of target by 1.
SLOW.name: $t(glossary:effects.Slow)

STUN.description: Stuns the target. The target cannot attack, move or using potions.
STUN.name: $t(glossary:effects.Stun)
